name: Ripple Effect (itch)
description:
Developed from a distant memory, Ripple Effect aims to pay homage to a lost game. Create a chain reaction to destroy all the circles on the screen in this visually attractive and relaxing game.

There are no Goals

Ripple Effect has no goals. There are no levels, or timers. Ripple Effect aims to be as stress-free as possible. Simply click anywhere on the screen to create your first circle and begin the ripple effect.

---

Music: James Hammond - "Walking On Clouds"
